div.codeblock: <RSELFDESCRIPTION>Djuna Barnes wrote bitterly about Nightwood's literary reputation: <q>there is not a person in the literary world who has not heard of, read, and stolen some from Nightwood, not more than three or four have mentioned my name.</q></RSELFDESCRIPTION>
